It seems like if I start multiple instances before I start any job, it
work=
s fine.

--- In archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com, "Hei" <structurechart@...>=
 wrote:
>
> Hi,
> 
> I am trying to crawl multiple sites at the same time.
=
> 
> I read the previous post that I could achive it by running multiple
> =
instances of Heritrix.
> 
> So here is what I found:
> - If I start an inst=
ance w/web interface, and then I start a job. 
> While the job is crawling =
a site, I go to setup tab and create another
> instance, when I click on th=
e instance, there is a NullPointerException.
> - If start an instance w/web=
 interface, and then I start a job, and
> then pause it.  When I start anot=
her Heritrix instance via the web
> interface, it kills the job I paused.
>=
 
> Probably I am not doing the right thing.  Anyone can guide me through?
=
> 
> Thanks in advance.
> 
> - H
>
